text: Ra eka arkako lagi chalakapata jo tiniharuka chatima thiyo hamile sabai nikalidinechaum. Tiniharuko (mahalaharu) muni naharaharu bagirakheka hunechan. Ra uniharule bhanne chan ‘‘ki, allahako hami dherai krtajna chaum jasale hamila'i yasa sthanasam'ma puryayo, ra yadi allahale hamila'i bato nadekha'eko bha'e hami svayanle bato pa'una sakne thi'enaum. Vastavamai hamro palanakartale patha'eka rasulale samco kura li'era a'eka thi'e. Unisita thulo avajama bhaninecha ki, yo jannata ho jasako timi varisa bana'i'eka chau. Yo timile timro karmako badalama pa'eka hau.’’
